entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
